title: A Smile For RBG
description:
U.S. Supreme Court Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg was iconic. Some would even say notorious. And her journey to the highest court in the land was just as incredible as the woman herself.

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes
